title: R44405
content: The CRS report provides annotated descriptions of authoritative sources on cybersecurity, including resources from government agencies, think tanks, academic institutions, news organizations, and other sources. The sources are listed in reverse chronological order, with a focus on material published in recent years. The report categorizes the resources into different tables, such as cybersecurity overview, congressional and government resources, international organizations resources, news resources, and other associations and institutions resources.
